channel.title: -How do i randomize the drops from a monster?-
channel.description:
Well i have added drops to the Daganoth Kings on my server, but they all drop the same thing, every kill, i kinda wanna mix it up a little.
So i added 3 daganoth kings in they're lair, 1 of them drops a sara godsword, fury, and dragon boots, the other drops zammy godsword, berserker ring, berserker necklace, i think you get my point, they all drop 3 items.
I tried adding this :
} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2883) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomDagannoth_Rex(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
Because a guy told me to do that to mix up the drops, but i now know it just adds big bones to the drop.
I just wanna mix them up a bit you know, maybe drop big bones once, fury + godsword once, you know what i mean?
Anyways if you can help it would be extremely appreciated.

item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Well i have added drops to the Daganoth Kings on my server, but they all drop the same thing, every kill, i kinda wanna mix it up a little.

So i added 3 daganoth kings in theyâ€™re lair, 1 of them drops a sara godsword, fury, and dragon boots, the other drops zammy godsword, berserker ring, berserker necklace, i think you get my point, they all drop 3 items.

I tried adding this :

                        }
                        if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2883) {
                            ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomDagannoth_Rex(),

Because a guy told me to do that to mix up the drops, but i now know it just adds big bones to the drop.

I just wanna mix them up a bit you know, maybe drop big bones once, fury + godsword once, you know what i mean?
